pages.text: The $(mob)Spirit Wight$() is a flying monster that spawns in the $(thing)Underworld$(). It attacks players, flying very slowly towards them, grabbing them and shaking them to temporarily stun them before flinging them high into the air. $(mob)Spirit Wights$() are immune to Fire and falling damage and may pass through blocks unimpeded. Furthermore, it can only be harmed with magical attacks such as potions of $(thing)Harming$(), or $(thing)Poison$(), or with enchanted weaponry.
